_spring_pass_through_helper.cancellation_policy: We understand that sometimes your travel plans change. We do not charge a change or cancel fee. However, this property (Sago Hotel) imposes the following penalty to its customers that we are required to pass on: Cancellations or changes made after 6:00 PM ((GMT-05:00)) on Jan 12, 2018, or no-shows, are subject to a 1 Night Room & Tax penalty.
